ac: 17, touch 11, flat-footed 16 (+1 deflection, +1 Dex, +6 natural, -1 size)
special_attacks: channel negative energy 3/day (DC 11, 1d6), destructive smite (+1, 4/day), rend (2 claws, 1d6+7)
other_gear: amulet of natural armor +1, ring of protection +1, 50 gp

spells.cleric spells prepared:
(CL 2nd; concentration +3)

1st-bless, divine favor, obscuring mist D, sun metal

0 (at will)-bleed (DC 11), detect magic, resistance, spark

D domain spell; Domains Destruction, Weather

feats: Channel Smite, Improved Iron Will, Iron Will, Weapon Focus (claw)
senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +7

sections.body:
Before Combat The troll acolyte casts bless on herself and her allies.

During Combat The troll acolyte casts divine favor or sun metal, then attacks.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: A troll acolyte has tested her devotion to a demon lord by searing her flesh with acid and fire so it must heal naturally, without regeneration.

name: Troll Acolyte
combat_gear: potion of bull's strength, potion of invisibility
